entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. High minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 23 this morning and minus 16 this afternoon. Forecast issued 08:48 AM CST Friday 06 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 12. POP 30%
